overview: Prison life at its grittiest is revealed in this urban tale about three teenage boys who follow in the footsteps of their father through the violent prison system. When a young filmmaker begins shooting a documentary on the boys, she discovers that a crooked cop set them up â€¦ and soon, she becomes more involved in the corrupt tale than she ever imagined.
tagline: Outside, they break they laws. Inside, they make them.
title: 15 to Life
